Living in a thatched roof house in the Ek Phnom district of Battambang province, Cambodia, Sokun is aged 30 years and married. She has two children; one of whom is dependent on her. She and her husband are rice farmers, who have been in farming to make a living for several years in order to better support their family. Her husband sometimes works as a paid construction worker in the local area. From the current business, she is able to earn about KHR 24,000 per day to meet the family’s needs. Low crop yield has been the main challenge for her rice farming business. 

Sokun’s group consists of three members who are all females. This is the third micro-loan for Sokun with VisionFund. The past loans have helped her relieve the family's financial burden and better support her family. Now, she and her group members are requesting a loan with VisionFund of KHR 800,000 each. As the leader, she is will use her portion to buy fertilizers and rice seeds for her farmland. She hopes this loan will enable her to increase her crop yield so as to make a better living.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and rice seeds for her farmland.

loans.name: Vigilina

texts.en: Vigilina is a married woman fro Bien Unido, Bohol. She has seven children to support out of her business selling fish and crabs that her husband catches. She and her husband work hard so they can provide the basic needs of their children. She is asking for a loan of PHP 9,000 to buy fishing nets, floaters, lead weights, nylon, and piglets for a hog-raising business. She hopes that her business will continue to flourish so she can give her children what they need. Her income will mostly go to school fees and food for her family.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets, lead weights, nylon, and piglets for a hog-raising business.

loans.name: Garma

texts.en:
Garma, age 49, is a mother of five children. She resides with her husband in West Point. Two of her children attend school while the other three are working. They are between the ages of 6 and 29.

For the past 14 years, Garma has been selling soft drinks, mineral water, cooking oil, sardines and lunch meat in her community. One problem she faces is the raining season, when there are less sales. She learned to sell from her mother.  With the profits she earns, she buys more goods to improve the business and improve her children's lives.  

Garma has requested this loan to purchase more soft drinks, mineral  water and cooking oil for her business. Her plan for the future is to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more soft drinks, mineral water and cooking oil for her business.

loans.name: Felecia

texts.en:
Felecia is 46 years old and lives in Sinkor. She is married and her husband is a businessman. They have two children, ages 16 and 19, who live at home and attend school.  

For the past 20 years, Felecia has been selling soft drinks, juice and cold water in the market. She has a lot of customers so she makes a lot of profit. She is requesting a loan to purchase more soft drinks, juice and cold water for her business. In the future, she plans to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more soft drinks, juice and cold water for her business.

loans.name: Marites

texts.en:
Marites is a resident of Talibon, Bohol, in the Philippines. She is married and a mother of three young children. 

Marites is engaged in pottery and has had a pot-making business for three years now. Pottery is a booming business in her town as well as in the entire country.

Marites plans to put her business into a wider scale to cater to more buyers and customers. However, she needs funds to make it work. She is asking for a loan of 8,000 PHP to buy additional materials for pot making. 

In the future, Marites hopes to make her business progressive and sustainable.

loans.use: to buy more materials for making pots.

loans.name: Vally

texts.en:
Vally is a 49-year-old hardworking lady with four children. She and her children live in Fort Portal, Uganda. She has a vision of educating her children so they attain degrees.

Six years ago, after Vally separated from her husband, she decided to start a bar to enable her to provide the basics to her children. The hardship she faces is inadequate capital to buy stock since she has a big client volume. She would like to expand her business to new markets and buy land for crop growing. Vally needs a loan to buy beer and sodas for selling.

loans.use: to buy beer and sodas for selling.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
Carmen, de 49 años de edad, convive junto a Mauro, de 52 años; viven en su propia casa que compraron gracias a su trabajo; en ella habitan junto a sus 02 hijos, quienes son el motivo de su esfuerzo. Carmen, es una mujer laboriosa, su actividad principal es labrar la tierra y cultivar plantas de cacao y café. Esta labor lleva realizando durante 10 años con el apoyo de su pareja y algunos jornaleros; comenta que siempre obtiene buena producción de sus cosechas, ya que siempre esta al pendiente de su trabajo. 
Las cosechas los comercializan en los centros de acopio de su Distrito, donde son bien remuneradas y eso a ella le gusta porque de esa manera se esmera por seguir adelante. Con el préstamo que obtuvo, podrá comprar plantas de cacao y café para seguir incrementando en su parcela. Este es su crédito número 07; una vez más se siente agradecida por el crédito que le brindan, siendo así seguirá continuando con sus planes de trabajo. En su banco comunal, es una socia responsable con sus cuotas de pago.
Con los 3,000 nuevos soles, realizará la compra de plantas de cacao y café, para luego cultivarlas en sus tierras agrícolas.
texts.en:
49-year-old Carmen lives together with 52-year-old Mauro.  They live in their own home, which they worked hard to buy, with their two children who are the motivation behind their hard work.  Carmen is a hard-working woman whose main business activity is working the land and growing cacao and coffee plants.  She has been in this line of work for ten years and has the support of her partner and some laborers.  She says that she always enjoys good yields because she always pays attention to her work.

Carmen sells her harvested crops in the warehouse centers in her district where she is well paid.  She is glad because she takes great pains to get ahead in life.

Carmen will use this loan to buy cacao and coffee plants so that she can continue increasing the crops she grows on her land.  This is her seventh loan and, once again, she feels grateful for the loan she is being given as it will enable her to continue with her business plans.  Carmen is a very responsible member of her community bank when it comes to making her repayments.  She will use her 3,000 soles to buy cacao and coffee plants which she will grow on her farmland.

loans.use: to buy cacao and coffee plants

loans.name: Esther

texts.en: Esther is 48 years old and lives in Sinkor. She is married and has four children between 18 and 27. They are in school and  live at home. Since 2010 she has been selling locks, nails, hinges, etc in the market. She has a lot of customers and makes a lot of profit. She is requesting a loan to purchase more locks, nails, hinges, etc for her business. She hopes to build a house and educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase more locks, nails, hinges, etc for her business

loans.name: Soma's Group

texts.en:
Soma, 37, lives with her husband in a rural area located in the Mongkul Borey of Banteay Meanchey, Cambodia. She has three dependent children. She has farmed rice on one hectare of farmland for ten years and has been involved in growing beans to supplement her family’s income for several years. The current business earns her approximately 25,000KHR per day and manages her to save about 10,000KHR each day after offsetting daily expenses for future needs.

Soma has been with VisionFund for one cycle while the other member is just the first cycled client with VisionFund. She has completely used the first loan to better support her current business and her family's living. Now she and her group member are applying for a loan with VisionFund of 500,000KHR each. Soma will use her portion to buy fertilizers and pesticides for her farmland. She hopes this loan will help her increase her current business and earn more income so as to fulfill her dream to have a proper motor vehicle for her family's transporation and she also hopes to buy a tractor to support her cultivation business.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and pesticides for her farmland

location.town: Banteay Meanchey Province, Mongkul Borey District

loans.name: C12059 Abakoranabushake Group

texts.en:
For the past ten years Jean Claude, a 37-year-old married father of three children between 5 and 8 years of age, has owned an agriculture business selling rice, an enterprise that is open from 6 a.m. until 12 p.m. everyday. The leader of the group called "C12059 Abakoranabushake" in the local language, he is the person raising his hand in the photo.

Jean Claude has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company in order to expand his agriculture by cultivating more rice to sell. With the profit, he expects to save money for his future and to pay his children's school fees.

loans.use: To expand his agriculture by cultivating more rice to sell.

loans.name: Johnson

texts.en: Johnson is a thirty five year old married man with ten children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. He has a personal goal of educating his children and building a permanent home. He is a farmer and has been in the agriculrture sector for ten years now. Just like most farmers in developing countries, he lacks bargaining power for his yields and processing facilities. He has a plan of setting up a retail shop to help him supplement his farming activies especially during the off season period. Johnson needs a loan to  pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for his children.

loans.name: Veronica Esperanza

texts.es:
La sra Verónica comenzó hace 7 años {2005) con un préstamo familiar compro unos cerdos para criar poco a poco fue aumentando sus animales hasta llegar a tener cerdos de raza.

Verónica se levanta a las 6am va a ver la comida para cerdos “labasa” a casa de su hermano y les da de comer a los cerdos. Hasta ahora ha tenido dificultades en su negocio y con la ayuda de Dios va progresando en su negocio día a día.  Es madre soltera tiene 2 hijos (10 y 6 años) estudian en escuela particular  con el préstamo va a comprar más cerdos. 
Unos de sus sueños es poder comprar un vehículo-camioneta para poder realizar la entrega de los cerdos a otros lugares mas distanciados de la ciudad.
texts.en:
Verónica started her business seven years ago (in 2005).  She used a family loan to buy some pigs to raise and then gradually increased her number of animals.  She now has purebred pigs.  

Verónica gets up at 6.00am and goes to collect pig feed at her brother's house to feed the pigs with.  Up to now she not has experienced any difficulties in her business and, with God's help, she continues making daily progress in her business.  Verónica is a single mother.  She has two children who are 10 and 6 years old and are studying at a private school.  She will use her loan to buy more pigs.

One of Verónica's dreams is to buy a truck so that she can deliver her pigs to places which are further from the city.

loans.use: to buy pigs

loans.name: Ry's Group

texts.en: Ry, a young 25-year-old mother of one little kid, is a citizen from Kror Kor district, Cambodia. To survive, she earns a daily income from her rice cultivation business as a primary income. To increase the family income, she also sells vegetables and her husband drives a motor taxi during his spare time. She has managed both of her businesses for seven years and is able to earn almost KHR 12,000 on average. Her main challenge is the drought, which lowers her yield. This cycle is a first loan cycle for Ry. She is the leader of her group consisting of three female members. One fellow group member is also a first-time borrower while the remaining one is a fourth-time borrower. She is requesting an amount with another co-member of KHR 1,000,000 each, while the remaining member is applying for KHR 500,000. She will use her loan portion to buy fertilizer in order to boost her yield. Moreover, she will use a portion of it to buy more vegetables for resale. She hopes to grow her rice fruitfully so as to double her income and maintain a good standard of living that is better than before.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer for farmland and vegetables for resale.

loans.name: Joab

texts.en: Joab is a 27 year old married man. He describes himself as hardworking, faithful and obedient. He operates a beauty salon where he provides hair services. He has been involved in this business for 3 years and employs 3 staff members. His business is located at a busy shopping market and his primary customers are businesspeople and local residents. He describes his biggest business challenge to be stiff competition within the area. He will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy beauty products. His business goal is to improve his business within 5 years. He hopes that in the future, he will run a bigger beauty salon. This is his second loan. He managed to pay the earlier loan of KES 20,000.

loans.use: to buy beauty products

loans.name: Elva

texts.es: Elva de 34 años, es una mujer casada con Rubén de 37 años, viven en la casa que compraron juntos y donde habitan con sus 03 queridos hijos. La actividad que ejerce la señora Elva, es a la venta de comestibles (verduras, conservas, cereales, etc.); su labor lo realiza en el primer piso de su vivienda en su Distrito, con la ayuda de sus hijos o su esposo. Para ella su trabajo es muy agradable, ya que siempre cuenta con ingresos gracias a las ventas que realiza a diario; comenta que desde que empezó a sacar préstamos en MFP, ahora cada vez más va mejorando su negocio y todo gracias a los financieras quienes apoyan a sus planes de trabajo. Ahora con el préstamo que obtuvo, realizará la compra de mercaderías para incrementar en sus estantes y mostradores. Este es su crédito número 10 y se siente muy contenta por la confianza que le brinda, se compromete a ser puntual con sus cuotas de pago como en anteriores créditos. En su banco comunal, trabaja es una socia activa y solidaria con sus compañeros. Con los 4,000 nuevos soles, se abastecerá de cereales, bebidas, conservas y verduras.
texts.en:
Elva is 34 years old, married to Rubén who is 37 years old. They live in a house they bought together with their three darling children.

Elva’s activity is selling food (vegetables, preserves, cereals, etc.). She does this work in her district on the first floor of her residence with the help of her children and her husband. She enjoys the work, as she always has income thanks to her daily sales. She says that since she began getting loans through MFP, that each time she improves her business and all thanks to the lenders that support her work plans.

Now, with the obtained loan, she will buy merchandise to increase her supplies and shelves. This is her tenth loan and she feels very happy for the confidence granted, and she promises to be punctual with her payments as she has with previous loans. In her communal bank she works as an active member in unity with the other members. 

With the 4,000 soles, she will stock cereals, beverages, canned goods and vegetables.

loans.use: to buy cereals, drinks, canned food and vegetables for her home-based grocery store

loans.name: Philip

texts.en: Philip is a married man. He has a child. He describes himself to be an aggressive man. He operates a motorcycle providing transportation services. He has been involved in this business for two years. His business is located within a potential business area and his primary customers are local residents. He describes his biggest business challenge to be delay of payments of customers who come especially at night and the insecurity within the area. He will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy household items for starting a new business of a retail store. His business goal is to run a general shop within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will expand his retail shop to a supermarket.

loans.use: to buy household products such as sugar, salt, maize flour, etc. for starting a new retail store.

loans.name: Juan Jose

texts.es:
Juan tiene más de 5 años en la profesión de electricista  a raíz  que aprendió el oficio lo ha ejercido. 

 Todos los días trabaja viajando donde los clientes requieran el servicio de el desde las 8:00am hasta las 20:00pm no tiene ninguna dificultad en el trabajo.  Juan está casado  y tiene 2 hijos estudian es escuela fiscal. 

Con el préstamo va a comprar tubería  eléctrica, cables y regletas  unas de sus metas es terminar de construir su casa lo que es fachada y seguir trabajando por el bienestar de su familia.
texts.en:
Juan has been an electrician for over five years. He works every day from 8 am to 8pm travelling to wherever his clients need his services. He has no work-related problems. Juan is married and has two children who attend school.

With the money from the loan he is going to buy electric tubing, cables, and adaptors. One of his goals is to finish building his half-completed house; another is to continue working hard to support his family

loans.use: buy electric tubing, cables, and adaptors

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan tiene 42 años de edad, es soltero y vive con su anciana madre en una casa que ellos construyeron. Juan es un hombre ejemplar. La decisión de cuidar a su madre lo convierte en una persona responsable. Desde niño aprendió a trabajar la tierra y atender a los animales que sus padres criaban. Es por eso que él también se dedica a esas actividades. 
 En los terrenos de su propiedad, se encarga de producir papas de la variedad “Yungay” y otras de colores. 
“Cuando cosecho llevo mis productos hasta Tarma (a 1 hora y media de su localidad), para venderlos”, menciona.
Juan está contento con su trabajo, porque le gusta estar rodeado de sus cultivos y verlos crecer. Por eso no duda en seguir con su actividad. Por eso requiere comprar varias bolsas de semillas de papas para continuar con su labor. Necesita de su ayuda.  Éste es su préstamo número 9 con MFP. Como anteriormente, dice que pagará las cuotas mensuales con puntualidad. Pertenece al banco comunal “Mirando un futuro mejor”, un grupo sólido y de socios muy activos y responsables.
Con todo el dinero podrá adquirir semillas de papas de la variedad “Yungay”, para iniciar una siembra.
texts.en:
Juan is 42-years old, single, and lives with his elderly mother in a house that they built. Juan is an exemplary man. The decision to look after his mother made him a responsible person. As a child he learned how to work the land and care for the animals that his parents were raising. For these reasons he too is a farmer.

He is grows potatoes (Yungay variety and other coloured ones) in his fields. “After the harvest,” he says, “I take the potatoes to Tarma, one and a half hours away, to sell them.”
Juan is happy with his job because he enjoys being in the midst of his fields and seeing his crops grow, so he is certain that he will continue with this line of work. He needs your help to buy several bags of seed potatoes. This is his ninth loan with MFP. As he has done in the past, he will pay back the money punctually. Juan belongs to the Mirando un Futuro Mejor Community Bank, a committed group with active and responsible members.

He will use all the loan money to buy Yungay seed potatoes and begin planting them.

loans.use: to buy seed potatoes

loans.name: Oun

texts.en:
Oun, 41, lives in a wooden house in a rural village of the Dambae district of Kampong Cham province, Cambodia. He is married with two children, all of whom are dependent on him and still in school. 

To make a living, Oun has been in planting cassava on 1.5-hecare area of farmland. Though his involvement with this business for six years, he earns about 24000 KHR per day and saves approximately 10000 KHR each day for future needs.

Oun plans to generate extra income for his family by raising pigs. He will use a VisionFund loan to buy piglets, feed and use a portion of it to construct a piggery. This is Oun's first microloan with VisionFund, and he is asking for a loan of 3000000 KHR.

Oun hopes this loan will enable him to start up another business to gain additional income and also hopes that the pig business will become more profitable so as to improve his lifestyle and keep his children in school.

loans.use: to buy piglets, feed and construct a piggery.

loans.name: Kety

texts.es:
Kety de 27 años, convive con su pareja con quien tiene 3 hijos de 10, 5 y 2 años. Esta familia vive en una casa propia ubicada en un distrito agrícola y ganadero. Kety es una madre esmerada y trabajadora. Fue madre muy joven, desde entonces decidió dedicarse a la agricultura en terrenos que sus padres le otorgaron. Ahora menciona que la actividad que le da mayor satisfacción es la ganadería.
“Tengo más de 50 carneros, que crío en las zonas altas, cuando están grandes los vendo o los sacrifico”, dice. Ella obtiene ganancias considerables de las ventas de la carne, el pellejo, la menudencia y otros; las que ofrece en un puesto improvisado en el mercado de su distrito.
Kety tiene grandes aspiraciones, entre ellas ampliar sus campos de cultivos y mejorar la raza de sus animales. Por ahora se dedicará a la crianza de más ovejas, para continuar con su negocio de carnes. Éste es su préstamo número 4 con MFP. Se compromete en pagar las cuotas mensuales con puntualidad. Por otra parte reconoce el trabajo de su banco comunal “Mirando un futuro mejor”, como solidario y cooperativo por la comprensión con los demás socios.
Invertirá los 500 soles en la compra de 6 cabezas de ganado ovino para engordarlos y posteriormente venderlos.
texts.en:
Kety is 27 years old. She lives with her husband with whom she has three children aged 10, 5, and 2 years. This family lives in their own home located in an agricultural and livestock district. Kety is a diligent and hardworking mother.

She became a mother at an early age. Since then she decided to work in agriculture on land that her parents gave her. Now she says that she gets the most satisfaction from the livestock. “I have more than 50 rams, that were raised in the highlands, when they are grown I sell or butcher them,” she says. She makes good profits on the sales from the meat, skin, innards, and more that she sells in a make-do stand in the district marketplace. 

Katy has big goals including expanding her crop fields and improving the breed of her animals. For now she is working raising more sheep, to continue her meat business. This is her fourth loan through MFP. She promises to make her monthly payments on time. In addition she affirms that working with her communal bank “Mirando un futuro mejor,” is united, collaborative, and is supportive of the other members.

She will invest the 500 soles in the purchase of 6 head of sheep to fatten for later sale.

loans.use: to buy six head of sheep to fatten in order to sell later

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es:
Maria de 68 años empezó con su negocio hace 10 años, decidió colocar  una tienda en la entrada de su casa y así poder generar ingresos. 

Sigue con su negocio de víveres y ahora su trabajo lo realiza desde la 6:00am hasta las 22:00pm con ayuda de su nieta que vive cerca por el sector.  No tiene ninguna dificultad y goza de excelente salud. 

Maria tiene 4 hijos todos son adultos de 47,46, 45, 42  años de edad. Con el préstamo va a comprar arroz, bebidas, enlatados. Unos de sus sueños es tener un local más adecuado para su negocio ya que solo atiende desde su ventana de la casa
texts.en:
Maria, age 68, started her business ten years ago.  She decided to place a store at the entrance to her house in order to be able to generate income.

She continues with her food business, and she now works from 6:00 a.m. until 10:00 p.m.  Her granddaughter, who lives close to her area, helps her.  She does not have any difficulties, and she enjoys excellent health.

Maria has four children who are all adults, ages 47, 46, 45, and 42.
She will use the loan to buy rice, drinks, and canned goods.

One of her dreams is to have a place that is better suited for her business.  This is because she only does business from the window of her house.

loans.use: to buy rice, drinks, and canned goods.

loans.name: Rolando

texts.es:
Rolando tiene 41 años, convive con Miriam. Ambos tienen un hijo de 14 años, al que cuidan y educan con esmero. Ellos viven en una casa propia ubicada en un distrito agrícola y ganadero. Rolando es un hombre responsable. Hace más de 20 años que se dedica a la ganadería con la crianza de ovinos.
“Empecé con 3 ovejas que heredé de  mis padres, pero con mucho trabajo logré multiplicar mi ganado”, menciona.
La venta de carnes de oveja es un negocio rentable, según comenta, por eso no duda en llevar su mercadería hasta el mercado modelo de la ciudad de Tarma (a una hora y media de su localidad).
Gracias a su trabajo coordinado y empeñoso, al lado de su pareja ha logrado adquirir un auto, con el que se desplaza con facilidad. 
Él desea adquirir otro auto para realizar servicios de transporte en su zona, para ello continuará con sus actividades. Ahora piensa adquirir 20 cabezas de ganados ovinos para continuar con su negocio de carnes. Sería el préstamo número 14 que obtendría de MFP, comenta ser firme y constante en el pago de las cuotas. Por otra parte, se siente a gusto trabajando con su banco comunal “Mirando un futuro mejor” , además es parte de la junta directiva. Con los 2000 soles comprará 20 ovejas pequeñas, las que criará y luego venderá.
texts.en:
Rolando is 41 years old and lives with Miriam. They have a 14-year old son whom they love and raise with great care. They all live in their own house located in a farming and animal-raising district. Rolando is a responsible man, and for over 20 years has earned his living raising sheep. “I began with three sheep left to me by my parents,” he says, “but with much hard work I now have many more.”

Selling the meat from the sheep is a profitable business. He takes the meat to the Modelo Market in the town of Tarma, about an hour and a half from his home.

Through hard work, he and his wife have managed to acquire a car so they can travel around with ease. Rolando now wishes to buy another car and continue his transportation service in the area. He is also planning to acquire twenty more head of sheep so he can continue his meat business.

This will be his 14th loan with MFP. He is responsible and regular with the repayments. As well, Rolando likes working with his community bank called “Mirando un Futuro Mejor” and is on the board of directors. With the 2,000 soles he will buy 20 lambs, raise them, and then sell them.

loans.use: buy twenty lambs

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.es: La Sra. Lourdes tiene 20 años, ella se dedica a tejido de mantas de Alpaca para las mujeres de pollera, ella vive en la localidad de Igachi este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Lourdes  va a usar este préstamo para la compra de lana de alpaca por mayor para el tejido de sus  mantas ya que por esta fechas que se acerca el aniversario de la localidad y tiene mucha venta también entrega pedidos a los distintos mercados de la ciudad de El Alto, su razón para solicitar este préstamo es incremento de capital de trabajo, la Sra. Lourdes enfrenta retos en su negocio que son surtir su mercadería y va a utilizar los beneficios e seguir comprando por mayor
texts.en: Lourdes is twenty years old. She is dedicated to knitting Alpaca shawls for indigenous women. She lives in the town of Igachi. This loan is her first with the the institution. Lourdes is going to use this loan to buy alpaca wool at wholesale to sew her blankets since her town's anniversary is approaching and she has many sales and she also delivers orders to different markets in the city of El Alto. Her reason for requesting this loan is increasing working capital. Lourdes faces challenges in her business that are stocking merchandise and she is going to use the benefits to keep buying at wholesale.

loans.use: to purchase alpaca wool at wholesale.

loans.name: Romulo

texts.es:
Rómulo tiene 55 años está casado con Ambrosia, con quien tiene  8 hijos, pero solo vive con el menor de 16 años. Ellos viven en una casa propia ubicada en un distrito agrícola y ganadero. Rómulo es un hombre ejemplar. A su edad se dedica a la agricultura, una actividad muy cansada, pero reconfortante.
Él cultiva papas en grandes cantidades. Mayormente en los meses de mayo, noviembre y diciembre. “En esta zona las papas harinosas crecen grandes y sanas, por eso su precio de venta siempre es favorable”, menciona.
Rómulo empezó esta actividad desde que era joven, y después formó su familia. Ahora, con la experiencia de muchos años, aprendió a realizar otros negocios, como la venta de carne de carnero, todos los viernes viaja para Chanchamayo donde tiene un puesto de venta. Los jueves y domingos expende las carnes en el mercado de Tarma. De esta manera Rómulo trabaja y sale adelante. Está muy agradecido por al ayuda que se le brinda y la confianza, por eso esta vez también espera el apoyo para iniciar otra siembra de papas. Éste es su crédito número 2 con MFP. Como en el anterior préstamo, menciona que, será puntual en el pago de las cuotas mensuales. Pertenece al banco comunal “Mirando un futuro mejor” y le agrada el trabajo en equipo.
Con el dinero adquirirá bolsas de fertilizantes y guano de corral (1500 soles), además comprará semillas de papas (500 soles).
texts.en:
Rómulo is 55 years old. He is married to Ambrosia with whom he has 8 children but he lives only with the youngest who is 16. They live in their own house located in a farming and ranching area. Rómulo is an exemplary man. At his age, he is dedicated to farming, a very tiring but heartwarming activity. He grows potatoes in great quantities mainly in the months of May, November and December. "In this area, the floury potatoes grow big and healthy. As a result, their selling prices is always favorable", he mentions.

Rómulo began this work when he was young and later started his family. Now, with the experience of many years, he learned to start other businesses like selling beef. Every Friday he travels to Chanchamayo where he has a stall. On Thursdays and Sundays, he sells meat in the Tarma market. In this way Rómulo works and gets ahead. He is very thankful for the help and trust provided to him so this time he also hopes for support to start another crop of potatoes. This is his second loan with MFP. Like the previous loan, he mentions that he will be punctual with his monthly payments. He belongs to the "Mirando un futuro mejor" (looking at a better future) community bank and he likes teamwork. With the money, he will acquire bags of fertilizer and farmyard manure (1500 soles). Also, he will buy potato seed (500 soles).

loans.use: to buy bags of fertilizer and potato seeds.

loans.name: María Laura

texts.es:
María tiene 47 años, se describe como una persona trabajadora, felíz, caritativa y muy responsable. María vive con sus tres hijas en Pastocalle.

María se dedica a la venta de pescados fritos en un puesto de venta, trabajo que le ayuda a sustentar y cubrir los gastos y estudios de sus hijas al momento por su carisma y amabilidad tiene buenas ventas, por lo cual solicita el crédito a Fodemi para la compra de pescados cada fin de semana y también incrementar su negocio comprando refrescos para que le de un poco más de ingresos.

María sueña en reconstruir su casa ya que está detereorada y que sus hijas sean todas profesionales para que tengan una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María is 47 years old and describes herself as a person who is hard working, happy, generous and very responsible.  María lives with her three daughters in Pastocalle.

María dedicates herself to the sale of fried fish from her food stall.  This work helps her support her family and cover the expenses of her daughters’ educations.  For the moment, sales are good because of her charisma and friendliness.  She requests a loan through Fodemi in order to buy fish every weekend, and also to expand her business by buying beverages so she can generate even more income.

María dreams of rebuilding her home, as it has deteriorated, and for her daughters to all become professionals who enjoy a higher standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fish on weekends and to buy beverages.

loans.name: Francis

texts.en:
Francis is a hardworking young adult who continues operating his motorcycle taxi. He has acquired a lot of experience out of this business. Since the previous loan, he has been able to generate the income with which he sustains his own expenses and contributes economically so his family can have a better quality of life. 

Francis has achieved progress, and he has very good clients in his business, which permits him to have good income that keeps increasing. Francis is looking for another loan that will allow him to buy a second-hand motorcycle.

His dream is for his business to progress and permit him to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a second-hand motorcycle.

loans.name: Jenny Marisol

texts.es:
Jenny es una chica de 22 años de edad, se caracteriza por ser una persona emprendedora y le gusta triunfar en la vida. Jenny vive con sus padres en Pujilí cerca de Latacunga.

Jenny al momento estudia y trabaja, ella se dedica a la crianza y compra venta de cerdos, este negocio ayuda a generar ingresos para poder cubrir los gastos de sus estudios y ayudar en los gastos de su hogar, Jenny constantemente piensa en incrementar sus ventas e ingresos es por eso que decide realizar un crédito en fodemi el mismo que va a invertir en la compra de un chancho reproductor de raza para poder tener crías y así su negocio crezca considerablemente y ayude a Jenny a acabar sus estudios.

Jenny sueña en ser profesional y convertirse en una distribuidora de cerdos.
texts.en:
Jenny is 22 years old. She is known for being enterprising and she likes to succeed in life. Jenny lives with her parents in Pujilí near Latacunga.

At this time Jenny studies and works. She works raising and selling pigs. This business helps her to earn money to cover the cost of her studies and helps with the household expenses. Jenny constantly thinks of increasing sales and earnings and this is why she decided to ask for a loan through FODEMI which she will invest in the purchase of a pure-bred breeding pig in order to have offspring and thus expand considerably, helping Jenny to finish her studies.

Jenny dreams of being a professional and becoming a pig distributor.

loans.use: to buy a pure-bred breeding piglet to have offspring in order to expand her business which helps her earn money to cover the cost of her studies

loans.name: Toribia Susana

texts.es: La señora Toribia tiene 36 años es casada y tiene dos hijos que son de las edades de 5 y 16 años, ella es  cliente que se encuentra en su segunda secuencia en la institución vive en la zona de las lomas, ella  se dedica al barnizado, afinado y acabado de sillas su taller esta en el mismo domicilio vive con sus hijos y su esposo que se dedica  a la carpintería  realiza puertas  y closets para cocina el crédito esta destina para la  compra de madera y un acepilladora, la Sra. Toribia vive en casa propia a medio construir. Mas adelante tienen planificado realizar la construcción de su vivienda y así brindar más comodidad a su familia, Trabaja toda la familia, apoyándose juntos en la fabricación y comercialización de muebles, con el tiempo desea tener un taller más grande y así poder emplear mano de obra ya que otros jóvenes también aprendan el oficio de la carpintería, con el anterior crédito le fue muy bien por este motivo sigue invirtiendo en su negocio.
texts.en: Toribia is 36 years old, married, and has two children ages 5 and 16.  She is a client who finds herself in her second sequence with the institution.  She lives in the Las Lomas zone and dedicates herself to varnishing, detailing and finishing of chairs.  Her workshop is in her own home where she lives with her children and husband, who dedicates himself to carpentry making doors and kitchen cabinets.  The loan is destined for the purchase of lumber and a planing machine.  Toribia lives in her own home, which is still under construction.  In the future, she plans to finish building her home and therefore bring more comfort to her family.  The whole family works, supporting each other in the making and selling of the furniture.  Over time, she would like to have a larger workshop to be able to employ more laborers and therefore other youngsters will also learn the carpentry trade.  Things went very well with the previous loan and, for this reason, she continues investing in her business.

loans.use: to buy a planing machine and lumber.

loans.name: Guido Eduardo

texts.es:
Guido es un hombre trabajador, desde que el era pequeño  su padre era técnico y enderezaba vehículos, él aprendió del negocio porque su papa le enseño desde muy pequeño y a él le gusto.  No quiso aparearse de lo que el papa le había enseñado es por eso que el también le enseña a su hijo para que también siga con el negocio. 

En la actualidad su trabajo lo hace con su hijo reparando vehículos desde las  9:00 - 17:00pm, unas de sus dificultades es el más clima. 

 Guido está casado tiene 3 hijos de 25, 27, 15 años el menor  estudia en colegio fiscal, su esposa se dedica a los quehaceres domésticos, con el préstamo va a mejorar su local donde tiene el taller de reparacion de vehiculos, por eso quiere comprar cemento, arena, pinturas etc. El sueño de Guido es hacer un segundo piso en su domicilio.
texts.en:
Guido is a hard-working man who from a young age observed his father, a mechanic, fixing cars.  He learned the business because his father taught him as a young boy, and he enjoyed the work.  He also teaches his son the trade, so that he can also continue in the business.

He currently works with his son repairing vehicles from 9 am until 5 pm.  One of the biggest difficulties he faces is the climate.

Guido is married and has 3 children ages 25, 27 and 15.  The youngest is in school.  His wife dedicates herself to the household tasks.  He will use the loan to make improvements to his auto repair shop, which is why he wants to buy cement, sand, paints, etc.  Guido’s dream is to build a second floor on his house.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, paints.

loans.name: Edgar

texts.es:
Edgar  tiene 35 años, convive con su pareja, con quien tiene 2 hijos de 10 y 8 años. Edgar y su unida familia viven en una casa propia. Edgar es un hombre hábil y persistente. Estas características lo convierten en una persona ideal para el trabajo del campo. Su principal actividad es la agricultura. 
Actualmente se encarga de la producción de papas, ollucos y ocas (tubérculos andinos). Los que al cosechar vende satisfactoriamente en el mercado mayorista de su distrito y en varias ocasiones los traslada hasta la ciudad Tarma. 
Así también posee aproximadamente 2 centenas de ganado ovino, de cuyas ventas en carnes obtiene ingresos considerables. “Con estas actividades me va bien, porque me pude comprar una camioneta, así viajo con mis productos”, menciona. 
Este mes tiene planeado sembrar papas, para ello requiere del apoyo de ustedes para continuar con sus metas de emprendimiento. Éste sería su préstamo número 14 de MFP. Está muy agradecido por todo el apoyo en estos ciclos. Se compromete en pagar las cuotas con puntualidad. Pertenece al banco comunal “Mirando un futuro mejor”. Destinará los 2000 soles en la compra de sacos de semillas de papas y bolsas de fertilizantes para sus próximos sembríos.
texts.en:
Edgar is 35 years old. He lives with his spouse with whom he has two children who are 10 and 8 years old. Edgar and his united family live in their own house. Edgar is a persistent and able man. These characteristics make him an ideal person for country work. His main activity is farming. Currently, he is in charge of the production of potatoes, ollucos (similar to potato) and ocas (Andean tuber) which upon harvesting he sells satisfactorily in the largest market in his district and on various occasions transports them to the city of Tarma.

He also has approximately two hundred sheep whose meat sales generate considerable income. "With this activity, I'm doing well because I could buy a van and transport my products," he mentions.

This month he pans to plant potatoes. For this, he needs the support of you to continue with his goal of entrepreneurship. This would be his 14th loan with MFP. He is very thankful for all the support during these cycles. He promises to make his payments punctually. He belongs to the "Mirando un futuro mejor" (looking at a better future) community bank. The 2000 soles will be destined for the purchase of bags of potato seed and bags of fertilizer for his next planting.

loans.use: to buy potato seeds and fertizer.

loans.name: Yat

texts.en:
Living in a house with a thatch roof in a rural area of the Kampong Cham province’s Prey Chhor district, Cambodia, Yat is a 65-year-old widowed mother of five children. 

She has worked to feed her children through farming rice for 46 years and complemented the income by making baskets and producing palm sugar for sale. From the current business, Yat can earn around KHR 30,000 per day to feed her family's members. Lack of working capital for supporting the current business is the main challenge for her. 

She is in her first microloan with VisionFund. She is now seeking a loan of KHR 2,000,000. With this loan, she is going to buy rice seeds, fertilizers and pesticides for her farmland and use a portion to purchase bamboo for her basket business. She hopes to increase her current business so as to earn more income to improve her family's lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy rice seeds, fertilizers and pesticides for her farmland.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Daniel

texts.es: Daniel, tiene la edad  de 61 años, está casado,  vive con su esposa y dos hijos, los cuales le ayudan en las labores del campo. El con el crédito pretende comprar almacigo de café para su posterior siembra e  insumos como abonos y fumigaciones  y ayudarse con la mano de obra. El tiene pensado comprar  este almacigo para poder producir un poco mas y  poder generar más ganancias  y obtener una mejor calidad de vida y una estabilidad económica . Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Daniel is 61 years old. He lives with his wife and two children who help him with the farmwork. With the loans he intends to buy coffee seedlings to plant, as well as materials such as fertilizer and fumigation spray and pay for labor. He is planning on buying the seedlings to produce a little more, generate more income and have a better quality of life and financial stability. This is the first loan that he has received from FUDECOSUR. He has not taken out any other loans from government banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered him a loan with ease of payments and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: compra de almacigo

loans.name: Yeison

texts.es: Yeison, tiene la edad  de 20 años, está soltero,  vive con su mama actualmente. El con el crédito pretende comprar  una máquina para limpiar la plantación de café. El tiene pensado   mantener la plantación de café sin maleza para que el café este en mejores condiciones y el abono sea mejor aprovechado y tenga más efecto y así produzca mas y  obtener más ganancias y  una mejor calidad de vida y una estabilidad económica. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Yeison is 20 years old. He is single and lives with his mother currently. With the loan he intends to buy a machine to clean the coffee plantation. He plans to keep the coffee plantation without weeds so the coffee is in better condition and the fertilizer is better spent and has a greater effect and he produces more and obtains more earnings and a better quality of life and economic stability. This is the first loan received from Fudecosur. He has not had previous loans from state banks but Fudecosur has provided the loan with greater ease and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy working instruments.

loans.name: Betza

texts.es: La Sra. Betza tiene 43 años, tiene su pareja y un hijo de la edad de 18 años, ella se dedica al servicio de manicurista y también maquillaje en su salón de belleza que se encuentra en la zona El Palmar de la ciudad de Santa Cruz este préstamo es su segunda secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Betza va a utilizar este préstamo  para la implementación de un nuevo salón de belleza en otra zona  y también para  algunos materiales que necesita y así de esta manera incrementar  su capital de trabajo,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es que necesita ampliar su negocio, la Sra. Betza  enfrenta retos en su negocio que son tener mayor cobertura del mercado y va a utilizar los beneficios para seguir comprando materiales y mejorando su trabajo, el deseo de la Sra. Betza es tener su cadena de  salones de estética.
texts.en: Betza is 43 years old. She is married and has one child who is 18. She is dedicated to the service of manicurist and also makeup in her beauty salon that is found in the area of El Palmar in the city of Santa Cruz. This loan is her second with the institution. Betza is going to use this loan to start a new beauty salon in another area and also for some materials that she needs and, in this way, increase her working capital. Her reason for requesting this loan is that she needs to expand her business. Betza faces challenges in her business that are having greater market coverage and she is going to use the benefits to keep buying materials and improving her work. Betza's wish is to have a chain of beauty salons.

loans.use: to start another beauty salon.

loans.name: Alice

texts.en:
Alice is a 24-year-old married woman. She has three children with ages ranging from 3 years to 10 years. She describes herself as an honest and faithful woman. 

She operates a beauty saloon where she provides hair services and sells beauty products. She has been involved in this business for eight years. Her business is located along a busy road and her primary customers are women. She describes her biggest business challenge as competition. 

She will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy beauty products. Her business goal is to improve her business within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will improve her business.

loans.use: to buy beauty products.

loans.name: Nazia's Group

texts.en:
Nazia is 35 years old, an independent woman who is living with her family in a remote area of Punjab, Pakistan. Her family consists of two sons and three daughters. All of her children are studying in school. 

Nazia and her husband both are tailors by profession. For the past 25 years they have been running their own shop in a market. Her elder daughter helps them in their business and they want to hire some workers for their shop. 

Nazia, as a member of a four-person lending group, has requested a loan from Kiva partner BRAC Pakistan for purchasing new tailoring machines, clothing and some stitching material for new workers. 
 
She wants to use the profit to purchase a new motorbike for her husband so that they can easily travel from one place to another for business as well as family purposes. 

With all this she is also a very good and hardworking housewife. Her biggest dream of life is to provide a quality education to her all children.

loans.use: to purchase new tailoring machines and some stitching material.

loans.name: Frans

texts.en:
Frans, 36 years old, is married to Yanse, 30 years old. Frans and Yanse are blessed with a 5-year-old son named Christian who is attending play group. To cover his family's needs and the educational needs of Christian, Frans works as a motor taxi driver. Frans also plants vegetables to sell to generate extra income, but he decided to take a rest from the vegetable business as his wife is going to deliver a baby soon. Frans prefers to spend more time taking care of his wife than the plants. 

Recently, there was some damage to his motorcycle’s spare parts so he could not generate income from the motor taxi business. Frans should replace it but he did not have enough money to do so. He then applied for a loan of 4,000,000 IDR from TLM to replace the spare parts- tires, brakes, fender, etc.. He also needs to prepare some money for his wife's delivery fees.

loans.use: to replace the spare parts- tires, brakes, fender, etc., and also for his wife's delivery fees.

loans.name: Dedicacion

texts.es:
Dedicación tiene 46 años y es viuda. Tiene 5 hijas, pero sólo vive con la menor de 20 años, en una casa propia que construyó al lado de su esposo, años atrás. Dedicación es una madre dulce y una mujer trabajadora. Se desempeña como agricultora en terrenos de cultivos de su localidad y propios, donde produce distintas variedades de papas, especialmente, papas de color y harinosas. Así también cultiva ollucos (tubérculos andinos).  “Con la agricultura he logrado ahorrar bastante, por eso también empecé con otro negocio, con la venta de ganado”, menciona. Cada jueves y domingo sacrifica 2 cabezas de ganado ovino y ofrece las carnes en las ferias d su distrito. En cuanto a su producción, Dedicación vende sus cosechas en su propio distrito y en la ciudad de Tarma. Ahora piensa esforzarse en la siembra de 5 sacos de semillas de papas, para ello requiere de su apoyo. Éste es su crédito número 14 de MFP, por ello agradece la oportunidad de desarrollo. Se compromete a ser puntual en el pago de las cuotas. A su vez menciona sentirse contenta y respaldada por los integrantes de su banco comunal “Mirando un futuro mejor”.
Con el dinero podrá adquirir 5 sacos de semillas de papas para iniciar una siembra.
texts.en:
Dedicación is 46 years old and a widow. She has five daughters but only lives with the youngest, 20 years old, in her own home, which she built years ago with her husband. Dedicación is a sweet mother and a hardworking woman. 

She farms her own land in the area where she produces different varieties of potatoes, especially colored and floury potatoes. She also cultivates “ollucos” (an Andean tuber). “Since I was able to save enough from farming, I also started another business selling cattle,” she says. Every Thursday and Sunday, she sacrifices two heads of sheep and sells the meat at markets in her district. With regard to farming, Dedicación sells her harvests in her own district and in the city of Tarma.

She now plans to plant five sacks of seed potatoes and needs your support. This is her fourteenth loan from MFP and she is grateful for the opportunity to get ahead. She promises to be punctual in making her payments. She also mentions that she feels pleased and supported by the members of her communal bank, “Mirando un Futuro Mejor.”

With the money, she will be able to buy five sacks of seed potatoes to start planting,

loans.use: to purchase five sacks of seed potatoes.

loans.name: Rosa Elena

texts.es:
Rosa es una mujer de 25 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica con su pareja y sus 3 hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora, que junto con su pareja dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente Rosa no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta compartir gratos momentos con su familia.
Con mucho empeño y entusiasmo, Rosa puso en marcha su pequeño negocio de venta de productos de belleza, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, ella puede trabajar un aproximado de 10 horas diarias y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Rosa se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mercadería, tales como: shampoo, perfumes, maquillaje, cremas, entre otros artículos de belleza; de esta manera Rosa tendrá su negocio mejor abastecido, con ello espera aumentar sus ventas e incrementar sus ingresos económicos, los cuales poco a poco le servirán de mucho para poder ampliar su negocio y con ello espera lograr su gran sueño de ver a sus pequeños convertidos en buenos profesionales y en hombres de bien.
texts.en:
Rosa is a 25 year old woman. She lives in the city of Ica with her spouse and 3 children, whom she loves and who are her main reason for living. She is a kind, hardworking person who with her spouse puts all of her effort into getting her family ahead. Lamentably, Rosa wasn't able to study a profession, but she would have liked very much to do so. In her free time, she likes to share happy moments with her family.

With much hard work and enthusiasm, Rosa started her small business selling beauty products. She starts her work early every mroning. She can work approximately 10 hours a day and she thinks it is going well for her because of her dedication and the good service she gives her customers.

Rosa is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, sonce thanks to their help, she can buy her merchandise, such as shampoo, perfume, makeup, creams and other beauty items. This way, Rosa's business will be better stocked. She hopes to increase her sales and acheive her dream of seeing her children have great professional careers and good men.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as shampoo, perfume, makeup, creams, etc.

loans.name: Genaro

texts.es: Genaro, tiene la edad  de 73 años, está casado,  vive con su esposa  actualmente. El con el crédito pretende comprar unos cerdos de engorde el ya cuenta con tres en su poder y lo que pretende es reforzar el negocio. El tiene pensado comprar concentrado y unos cerdos para su posterior engorde y posterior venta en el mercado local y en lugares aledaños y así obtener más ganancias y  una mejor calidad de vida y una estabilidad económica. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Genaro is 73 years old. He is married and lives with his wife currently. With the loan, he intends to buy some pigs to fatten. He already has three and he intends to bolster his business. He intends to buy concentrate and pigs for fattening later and then sell in his local market and in surrounding areas and obtain more income and a better quality of life and economic stability. This is the first loan he has received from Fudecosur. He has not had other loans before from state banks but Fudecosur has provided the loan with greater ease and a lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy pigs to fatten.

loans.name: Yet

texts.en:
Yet, a 47-year old widow, is a responsible mother of four children, two of whom are dependent on her.

Yet has travailed to feed her children through growing cassava for over 20 years and sometimes working as a paid worker in the local area of the Ponhea Krek district of Kampong Cham province, Cambodia. The current business earns her around 27,000 KHR per day and she can save about 15,000 KHR each day.
 
Yet received the first loan from Kiva’s partner VisionFund a cycle ago and fully repaid the loan, which has improved her livelihood. She is now requesting a loan with VisionFund of 2,000,000 KHR. She will use this loan to spend on plowing the field and buying cassava seedlings for planting. She hopes to improve her current business to earn more income in order to set aside some money to build on her savings and fulfill her dream to grow rubber trees in the future.

loans.use: To pay for plowing the field and buying cassava seedlings.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Bendu

texts.en:
Bendu, 45, is a hardworking mother. She has 5 children, is married and lives at West Point. Her children are between the ages of 5 and 28. Only one of the children stays with her at home, the other four children are grown up and live on their own. 

Bendu has been operating a cook shop (restaurant) for the past 9 years. She sells different kinds of food everyday, 6 days a week. Her favorite dish that her customers love is cassava leaves, potato grains and palm butter. She makes profit everyday because she renders good services to her customers. She is requesting this loan to purchase more ingredients to meet the demand of her customers. Her plan for the future is to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more ingredients to meet the demand of her customers.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy plantains and bananas in bulk, a bag of peanuts, and a bag of onions

loans.name: Primitiva

texts.es:
Primitiva tiene 37 años, con Sergio. Ambos tienen 2 hijos de 13 y 11 años. Ellos viven unidos en una casa propia en una localidad ganadera. Primitiva es una mujer que se esfuerza en todas las actividades que realiza. Por esa razón se desempeña en un negocio de verduras en el mercado mayorista, además es agricultora. 
Pero la actividad que le está otorgando mayores satisfacciones es el servicio de transporte interprovincial. Hace 4 meses, su esposo y ella, adquirieron una minivan de segunda mano. Su esposo trabaja todos los días con la movilidad desde la ciudad de Tarma hasta Chanchamayo (selva central) y viceversa. 
Primitiva está contenta con sus actividades y con el apoyo que recibe, ya que gracias a las charlas educativas, se animó a incursionar en esta actividad.
Ahora requiere de más ayuda, pues necesita realizar el mantenimiento a su movilidad, para continuar trabajando.  Éste es su préstamo número 5 con MFP. Por ello se compromete a ser puntual en el pago de sus cuotas. Manifiesta que su banco comunal “Mirando un futuro mejor”, es unido, por eso le agrada trabajar con sus socios. Con el dinero comprará repuestos para su minivan, además pagará los servicios de mantenimiento de su movilidad.
texts.en:
Primitiva is 37 years old. She has two children with Sergio who are 13 and 11 years old. They live together in their own home in a cattle area. Primitiva is a women who puts effort into all her activities. This is why she works in her vegetable business in the wholesale market, and is a farmer.

But the activity that is most satisfying is the interprovincial transport service. Four months ago, she and her husband bought a second-hand minivan. Her husband works every day traveling from Tarma to Chanchamayo (central jungle) and back again.

Primitiva is happy with her activities and with the support she receives, and through educational talks, she was encouraged to venture into this activity. She now requires more help as she needs to service her vehicle in order to continue working. This is her fifth loan through MFP. She promises to be punctual in the payment of her loans. She says that her communal bank, “Mirando un futuro mejor,” is united, so she likes working with the members. 

She will use the money to buy spare parts for her minivan, and will pay to have the vehicle serviced.

loans.use: to buy spare parts to repair her vehicle and to pay the mechanic to service her vehicle which is used in her transport service between provinces on a daily basis

loans.name: Nancy Jubithza

texts.es:
Nancy tiene 39 años de edad, es madre de un pequeño de 2 años de edad, a quien saca adelante sola ya que el padre de su pequeño la abandono y por ello se ha convertido en madre y padre para el  y por quien trabaja muy duro para poder darle una vida digna y con mucho amor. Su vivienda se ubica en la calurosa ciudad de Pucallpa, ciudad que se encuentra ubicada en la selva peruana, es una ciudad con flora y fauna muy hermosa. Como buena peruana le gusta mucho la comida y por ello uno de sus platillos favoritos es el riquísimo pollo al cilindro. 

Con mucho entusiasmo Nancy trabaja en su pequeño negocio de servicio de fotocopiado y internet, en el cual trabaja alrededor de 10 horas diarias y puede atender hasta 30 clientes diariamente; ella cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es muy amable con los clientes y por sus ganas de salir adelante.

Nancy está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar equipos celulares para su negocio, ya que va ofrecer esos productos en su negocio y con ello tener un ingresos mas, lo que le  permitirá mejorar sus ingresos y seguir luchando para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una profesión a su hijo”.
texts.en:
Nancy is 39 years old. She is the mother os a two year old boy, whom she is getting ahead alone since the boy's father abandoned her. She is now mother and father for him and she works very hard to give him a nice life with a lot of love. Her house is located in the hot city of Pucallpa, in the Peruvian jungle. It is a city with beautiful floran and fauna. Like a good Peruvian, she really likes food and that is why one of her favorite dishes is the delicious pollo al cilindro. 

With much entusiasm, Nancy works in her small photocopying and internet business. She works there around 10 hours a day and can serve up to 30 customers a day. She thinks her work is going well because she is very friendly to the customers and because of her drive to get ahead.

Nancy is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to the help they have offered, she can buy cell phone equipment for her business. Offering these products in her business will bring her more income, which will allow her to keep fighting to make her biggest dream come true: "giving my son a profession".

loans.use: to buy cell phone equipment

loans.name: Andres Luis

texts.es: El Sr. Andrés tiene 41 años,  se dedica  a prestar servicio de amplificación y juego de luces, amenizando todo tipo de acontecimientos ya sea bautizos matrimonios, fiestas de quince años,   es padre de familia, tiene tres hijas que se encuentran en edad escolar, vive en la zona Santa Rosa, su actividad económica es de prestar servicio de luces y sonido por más de 14 años, es un cliente antiguo, con el dinero del crédito comprara  dos equipos para su amplificación,  para mejorar el servicio,  el Sr. Andrés  se siente muy agradecido por la oportunidad que se le brinda para crecer en su negocio ya que con el anterior crédito le fue muy bien sigue equipando su amplificación y de esta manera genera más ingresos para el bienestar de su familia.
texts.en: Andrés is 41 years old. He is dedicated to lending amplification and light kit service, brightening up all kinds of events like baptisms, weddings, quinceaneras. He is the father of his family. He has three daughters who are school age. They live in the area of Santa Rosa. His work has been lending light and sound service for more than 14 years. His is an old customer. With the money from the loan, he will buy two pieces of amplification equipment to improve his service. Andres feels very thankful for the opportunity provided to him to grow in his business since with the previous loan, he did well equipping the amplification and generating more income for the wellbeing of his family.

loans.use: to buy two pieces of amplification equipment.

loans.name: Katherin Fabiola

texts.es:
Katherine es una joven de 19 años, vive en la ciudad de Chincha con su pareja, ella es una persona muy alegre, trabajadora y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo por superarse y salir adelante; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos, no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Administración de Empresas que tanto quería, pero sueña con poder hacerlo pronto.
Gracias al apoyo de su pareja, con mucho empeño y entusiasmo, Katherine puso en marcha su pequeño negocio de cabinas de internet, día a día desde tempranas horas de la mañana brinda sus servicios, ella se siente a gusto en su negocio y cree que le va bien por la buena atención que ofrece a sus clientes.
Katherine se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de dos una computadora, ya que desea contar con ellas para poder aumentar sus cabinas de internet y así poder incrementar sus ingresos económicos; de esta manera Katherine espera poder utilizar sus ganancias para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda ampliar su negocio y lograr su gran sueño de convertirse en una buena profesional.
texts.en:
Katherine is a young woman of 19 years of age. She lives in the city of Chincha with her partner. She is a very cheerful, hardworking, and enthusiastic person who has a great desire to overcome and to succeed. Unfortunately, because of a lack of funds, she was not able to study for the MBA that she wanted but she hopes that she will be able to do so soon.
Thanks to support from her partner, and with much determination and enthusiasm, Katherine started her internet cafe business. She offers her service everyday, starting in the early hours of the morning. She feels comfortable in her business and believes that it is doing well because of the good attention that she offers to her customers. 
Katherine is very grateful to the Kiva lenders as, thanks to the help she has been offered, she will be able to by two computers that she needs to enhance her internet cafe and so to increase her income. In the near future, Katherine hopes to be able to use the income to grow her business and achieve her great dream of becoming a professional.

loans.use: to buy two computers.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase different color thread to manufacture thread rolls.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pesticides for spraying tomatoes and cabagges.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy fresh seasonal fruits for resale.

loans.name: Ibrahim

texts.en: Ibrahim used the previous loan to buy clothes to sell. He is a 36-year-old, married man with children and lives in Fort Portal, Uganda. He first worked as a hawker, but he now owns a retail shop that sells clothes and dressmaking supplies. He has run this business for more than 5 years. His goals are to educate his children and diversify his business to include shoes. Ibrahim says that he needs to buy clothes ahead of the festive season in December in anticipation of high sales. Ibrahim needs the money to buy clothes to sell.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan tiene 42 años, está casado con Yolanda con quien tiene 2 hijos de 18 y 11 años. Esta familia habita una casa alquilada. Juan es un hombre inteligente. Sus hijos se encuentran estudiando, por ello arrienda una casa en la ciudad para estar cerca de ellos.
En su comunidad cuenta con terrenos propios donde tiene cultivos de papas y varias cabezas de ganados ovinos.
Gracias a la ganadería ha logrado generar ingresos seguros. Juan adquiere un carnero flacos a 100 soles y después de 2 meses lo vende a 170 soles. Él adquiere de 10 a 15 ovejas para realizar este negocio. Mientras su esposa se encarga de atender a los animales, Juan se encarga de las labores agrícolas. De esta manera este abnegado hombre trabaja coordinadamente para lograr ahorrar y cubrir sus necesidades básicas. Ésta vez Juan desea comprar más cabezas de ovejas, para ello requiere de apoyo. Éste es su crédito número 7 con MFP, se compromete a ser puntual en el pago de las cuotas. Además comenta, que el agrada el trabajo dentro de su banco comunal “Mirando un futuro mejor”, por compartir los mismos intereses. Destinará los 1000 soles en la compra de 10 carneros flacos, para engordarlos y venderlos.
texts.en:
Juan is 42 years old and married to Yolanda with whom he has two sons, who are 18 and 11 years old. The family lives in a rented house. Juan is an intelligent man. His children are in school and it is because of them that he is renting a house in the city to be near them.

In his own community he has his own land where he cultivates potatoes and several heads of sheep. Thanks to his livestock, he has succeeded in generating a stable income. He buys skinny rams at S/. 100 and later after two months, he sells them for S/. 170. He acquires from 10 to 15 sheep in order to carry out this business. While his wife deals with caring for the animals, Juan handles the farm work. Thus, this self-sacrificing man works in coordination with his wife to save money and cover their basic needs.

This time, Juan wants to purchase more sheep and to do so he needs help. This is his seventh loan from MFP and he promises to make all of his payments on time. He also notes that he enjoys working with his communal bank, “Mirando un Futuro Mejor” where he shares the same interests with others. He will use the S/. 1,000 to purchase ten skinny rams to fatten and later sell.

loans.use: to buy ten rams.

loans.name: Maria Luisa

texts.es: La señora María cuenta tiene 32 años  se dedica a  la venta de comida ella realiza esta actividad desde horas. 17:00 a 21:00 todos los días, ella vive con sus hermanos mayores trabaja para costear sus costos propios ella no cuenta con familia ( esposo e hijos) es soltera vive en casa familiar en la zona de Santiago en la ciudad de El Alto, el dinero del crédito lo utilizara en la compra de insumos para la elaboración de sus comidas como arroz, fideo, papa y aceite en cantidad, ya que esta época empiezan a subir los insumos y desea tener almacenado para que no le falte.
texts.en: María is 32 years old. She works selling food and does this from 5:00pm until 9:00pm everyday. She lives with her older siblings and works to pay her expenses. She does not have family (husband or children) - she is single. She lives in a family home in the Santiago area of the city of El Alto. She will use the loan money to buy bulk supplies for making the meals she sells such as rice, noodles, potatoes and oil as, at this time of year, the cost of supplies starts increasing and she wants to have enough supplies that she doesn't run out.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as rice, noodles, and potatoes.

loans.name: Vincent

texts.en:
Vincent is a 55-year-old hardworking man living in Fort Portal, Uganda. He has a personal goal of educating his children and building a permanent home.

For 16 years he has been farming tea and the business has been very profitable since he is near a tea factory and thus assured of a ready market. His hardships are seasonal weather, price fluctuations and inflation, while his vision is diversifying his business to include a retail shop, buying land to grow more tea and hiring employees to help expand his business.

Vincent is requesting a loan to buy tea for planting.

loans.use: to buy tea for planting.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy tires for a rickshaw

loans.name: Elizaveta

texts.en:
Elizaveta is from Bolnisi district and lives with her husband, daughter and a son. Elizaveta’s husband works as an artisan and her daughter as a teacher at the local school. They get monthly income. The family is involved in agricultural business, they have a vineyard and produce wine and vodka. They sell their agricultural production locally. In addition, Elizaveta runs a small dairy farm with 2 milk cows whose milk is used for cheese production. She sells cheese at the supermarket, where she works as a saleslady and gets a monthly salary as well. 

Elizaveta requested credit for purchasing 2 additional milk cows. She plans to expand the dairy farm through adding additional cows, but the existing cattle shed doesn’t allow her to implement this plan. So, the part of the loan will be used for purchasing building materials for a new cattle shed. Elizaveta will be able to double production and sales of cheese. The income of the family will significantly increase. All members of the family will be able to improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase milk cows and build a cattle shed

loans.name: Silvie

texts.fr: Silvie est une jeune femme de 29 ans, mariée et mére de 4 enfants dont l'âge varie entre 19 et 6 ans tous sont scolarisés. elle est commerçante dans un quartier de la capitale depuis 10 mois oû elle est cordonniere. son acceuil chaleureux, son dynamisme et sutout son savoir faire lui ont valu en si peu de temps une tré grande clientéle q'elle n'arrive plus à satisfaire à cause de la pétitesse de son capital. elle sollicite donc ce credit pour pouvoir augmenter son capital et s'acheter du cuire et le petit matériel de cordonnerie. elle espere que ce credit lui fera fidéliser sa clientéle voir même l'augmenter. elle souhaiterait avec les bénéfices réinvestir dans sa structure enfin de plus l'agrandir et avec le reste aider son mari dans les besoins de la famille .
texts.en: Silvie is a young woman who is 29 years old, married and mother to four children, whose ages range from six to 19 years old and who are all at school. She has been trading as a shoemaker in one of the capital's districts for the past ten months. Her warm welcome, dynamism and above all her know-how have enabled her to build up such a large customer base in a short period of time that she is not able to satisfy demand because of her small capital. She is thus requesting this loan so that she can increase her capital and buy leather and small shoe-making materials. She hopes that this loan will enable her to maintain the loyalty of her customers and even increase her customer base. She would like to reinvest the profits she makes in her business and expand it; with the rest she wants to help her husband provide for their family's needs.

loans.use: to buy leather and small shoe-making materials

loans.name: Edgardo Alexander

texts.es:
Edgardo es un joven de 19 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Ica con sus padres y hermanos, a pesar de ser tan joven él es una persona muy amable, responsable y trabajador, que tiene un gran deseo de superación, gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de sus padres Edgardo se encuentra estudiando una carrera profesional, en sus ratos libres le gusta relajarse escuchando un poco de música y en algunas ocasiones cocina unos riquísimos Tallarines Verdes para compartir con su familia.
Con mucho empeño y entusiasmo, trabaja como empleado en un hospital de su ciudad, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, él puede trabajar un aproximado de 8 horas y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Edgardo se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de una impresora, la cual será utilizada para que le sirva como apoyo para sus estudios; de esta manera él desea seguir trabajando y esforzándose para así convertirse en un buen profesional y en un hombre de bien.
texts.en:
Edgardo is a young man of 19 years of age. He is single and lives in the city of Ica with his parents and siblings. Despite being so young, he is a very kind, responsible, and hardworking person who has a great desire to overcome challenges. Thanks to his efforts and the support of his parents, Edgardo is pursuing a professional degree. In his spare time, he likes to relax by listening to music and, sometimes, by cooking some delicious Tallarines Verdes (pasta with spinach and basil sauce) to share with his family.
He works with much determination and enthusiasm as an employee in the city hospital. Every day he starts his work in the early hours of the morning and works for about 8 hours. He believes he is doing well because of his good performance and his kind treatment of others. 
Edgardo is very grateful to the Kiva lenders as, thanks to the help he has been offered, he will be able to buy a printer which he will use to support his studies. In this way, he hopes to keep working and striving to become a professional and a good man.

loans.use: to buy a printer.

loans.name: Luis Miguel

texts.es:
¡Saludos desde Perú! 

Este es el primer préstamo de Luis Miguel un joven de 20 años, estudiante de la carrera de psicología en la universidad; escogió esta profesión por vocación ya que tiene muchos deseos por ayudar a las personas; ya son 2 años que está estudiando y a pesar de las  dificultades económicas se esfuerza mucho para seguir adelante,  los fines de semana trabaja en un mercado como estibador  los ingresos que percibe le ayudan para solventar sus pasajes y algunos materiales para sus estudios. Luis Miguel solicito su préstamo para pagar la matrícula y todas  las pensiones del nuevo ciclo que empieza, de esa manera puede estudiar con tranquilidad para lograr ser un  profesional  exitoso, por este motivo se siente muy agradecido por los inversionistas KIVA quienes hacen posible obtener su préstamo.
texts.en:
Greetings from Peru!

This is the first loan for 20 year old Luis Miguel, university student of psychology. He chose this profession as a vocation because he is eager to help people. He has been studying for two years and despite the financial difficulties he puts effort into getting ahead. 

On the weekends he works in a market as a dock loader and the money he earns helps him pay for his travel expenses and some of the supplies he needs for his studies.

Luis Miguel is asking for a loan to pay tuition and all the fees for the new semester, so that he can study peacefully to become a successful professional, which is why he feels so grateful to the Kiva lenders who make it possible to get his loan.

loans.use: to pay tuition and fees for his university studies so he can study peacefully to become a professional in his chosen profession of psychology because he is eager to help people

loans.name: Mwinyihamisi

texts.en:
Mwinyihamisi, 31, is a hardworking, dedicated man who very much wants to get ahead. His spouse, who is also a business lady, is still childless. They live together in a rental house.

Mwinyihamisi manages a beauty salon where he has employed two ladies. He started two years ago with his own capital. Mwinyihamisi considers the business to be quite profitable because of the income it nets and the high demand for services and beauty products.

He is requesting this loan to open a business selling spare parts. Seeing the good results he’s been having, he wants to continue all the way to improve his business. With this loan, he will be able to buy spare parts for resale.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for resale.

loans.name: Weedor

texts.en:
Weedor lives in Sinkor. She has four children between 7 and 20, that live at home and attend school.

For more than 12 years, Weedor has been selling clothes in the local market. She first learned from a friend that helped her and later she was able to buy clothes to resell. Her current challenge is to manage her expenses as the clothes and transportation costs are getting more expensive. About being in business, she likes being independent and being able to set her own goals. She is requesting this loan to buy more clothes to sell. She is proud that through her business she was able to purchase a piece of land.
